entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 2:21 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -3.1°C
Wind: ENE 33 km/h gust 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or freezing rain. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain changing to freezing rain or ice pellets this afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. High plus 4.
